articles.title: Holi 2024: 10 most colourful lehengas worn by Bollywood divas - The Times of India
articles.description: These Bollywood divas truly stole the show with their stunning ensembles, adding a splash of colour and glamour. Let's checkout their Holi-worthy lehengas.
articles.content: Deepika Padukone stole the show in a striking electric blue lehenga adorned with intricate mirror work and vibrant embroidery, radiating elegance and charm.
